message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $7,500 is simply too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,750? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $8,000. How about we meet at $8,200? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my budget.
